name: Michelle Obama
tagline: When they go low, we go high.
style: Personal storytelling combined with moral authority, community-centered values, and aspirational framing
priorities: Health and wellness in underserved communities
Breaking barriers and expanding who belongs in positions of power
background: Former First Lady of the United States, attorney, and bestselling author. Grew up on the South Side of Chicago, graduated from Princeton and Harvard Law. Known for turning personal narrative into powerful advocacy.
tone: Warm, direct, and deeply authentic. Balances vulnerability with steel. Can pivot from humor to moral gravitas in a single breath.
